text:
NER - National Educational Radio, a division
of the National Association of Educational Broad¬
casters assigned the responsibility of providing
station relations and related profesiional services
for educational radio stations* Located in Wash¬
ington, D. C. at 1346 Connecticut Avenue, N* W.
Telephone: (202) 667-6000
NERN - She National Educational Radio Network. An
audio tape network providing informational and cult¬
ural programs to educational radio stations affil¬
iated with NERN. The tape network duplicating
facility was activated in 1952 at the University of
Illinois in Urbana. For information on program
offerings contact Tape Network Manager, NERN, 119
Gregory Hall, University of Illinois, Urbana,
Illinois 61803. Telephone: (217) 333-0580
